rows.label: qev085205_MSG0001
rows.name:
Uh, um, thanks to you we were saved.
Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0002
rows.name: It's fine. We are trained for situations like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0003
rows.name:
But if you two don't train some more,
surviving here on Mira will be tough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0004
rows.name: Yeah, no...you're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0005
rows.name:
Sorry about the other day.
I apologize to you and to Colonel Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0006
rows.name: I said it's fine already. Just get home in one piece.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0007
rows.name: R-right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0008
rows.name: Ugh, it's almost worse when they apologize.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0009
rows.name:
Iriina-san,
Sorry about earlier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0010
rows.name: Hmm? What for?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0011
rows.name: Saying we didn't have to help people like that[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0012
rows.name:
Oh, that.
To be honest, I kind of thought the same thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0013
rows.name: Huh? Really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0014
rows.name:
I think you have to put aside personal feelings and help, but
still, when you're pissed off, you're pissed off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0015
rows.name: So honest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0016
rows.name: That's impressive, to jump in and help anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0017
rows.name: It's just us on this planet, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0018
rows.name:
Even they are carrying
the hope of humanity[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0019
rows.name:
When I thought of it like that,
my body just moved on its own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0020
rows.name:
Sorry, Colonel Elma.
But I feel better now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0021
rows.name: Thanks for letting me tag along.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0022
rows.name: I see. That's good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085205_MSG0023
rows.name: Let's head back to NLA.[ST:wait ]
